Title: Big Middle
Plot: Catherine, Nick, and Warrick investigate a badly mutilated body in the woods. The cause of death was a shotgun blast. Nearby is a beaver dam made in part with cash. Grissom, Sarah, and Nick try to determine how a man was killed in a hotel room. It leads them to a convention of big women.
GuestStars: Michael Edwin, Steve Lawrence, Debra Christofferson, Kinna McInroe, Tara Karsian, Melora Hardin, Patrick Kilpatrick, John Furey, Craig Saslow
